April 12, 1992 D North American Championships (Championship Section)
North American Championships (Championship Section) 0 Set Test and Own Choice North American Championships north-american-bbc-championship-section
United States of America
Championship
Own Choice from a Specified List
Dublin Coffman High School, Dublin, Ohio, USA Bands were required to play a testpiece from a set list of three pieces as part of their concert programme.
Ohio Collegiate Brass Band also conducted by Dr Paul Droste
Outstanding soloist: David Laird, tuba, Atlantic Brass Band
Feb. 21, 2012, 4:54 p.m. Feb. 28, 2012, 11:28 a.m.
1 Central Ohio Brass Band Paul Droste Connotations
2 Triangle Brass Band Michael Votta Ballet for Band
3 Atlantic Brass Band Anthony Guerere Variations on a Ninth
4 Commonwealth Brass Band J. Jerome Amend Connotations
